attributes.comment:
This is outrageous!!! We already pay a great fee for adopting beautiful children
who NEED homes and loving families. You have to pay the I-171H sometimes
twice depending on how long the wait is, and now you want to increase the fees.
OUTRAGEOUS!!! We are doing something good by giving the children loving
homes we shouldn't have to break ourselves to do that. Especially when people
have babies EVERYDAY and then DON"T go through half of what we do. I think
you need to leave the fees as there are or if you truly feel you need to change
them you should lower them.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
